title: Move shared panel wrapper into individual pages
description: Remove the global app-panel wrapper from the root layout and apply page-specific panels so layouts can diverge across playlists, albums, and artists views.
notes: Moved panel layout ownership into each page. Root layout now renders router outlet directly. Playlists/Artists/Albums pages wrap content in app-panel with page-specific labels/meta; components updated to OnPush.

title: Simplify layout styles to Tailwind
description: Reduce custom CSS, rely on Tailwind classes/arbitrary values; keep gradients via inline classes; leave minimal CSS utilities.
notes: Aligned navbar title font with Tailwind arbitrary class font-[var(--font-display)] (no inline style).

title: Extract neon panel UI component
description: Create reusable panel UI shell (header, badge, meta) and use it in app layout.
notes: Added reusable Panel component (label/badge/meta inputs) with neon glass styling; app shell now uses it for routed content.

title: Refresh app layout to neon panel
description: Align app shell with arcade-inspired mock: gradient background, header, single glass panel for routed content.
notes: Updated app shell to neon-inspired layout with gradient background, illuminated header, and single glass panel wrapping routed content.

title: Switch theme colors to Tokyo Night
Add env-driven API config loader
description: Add .env entry for API base URL (default localhost:8080) and implement a single configuration class/service that reads, validates, and exposes config. Include typing, sensible defaults, validation errors with clear messaging, and documentation for local/production usage.

title: Update AGENTS.md and README with helpful future notes
Add keyboardable Albums filter list
description: Replace Albums list panel with an album filter button grid: selecting an album sets a selected album id. Keyboard navigation should mirror letter selectors (looping left/right/up/down). Component accepts previous/next callbacks wired to left/right arrow keys; left arrow moves focus to letter2 filter, letter2 right arrow moves focus into Albums. Keep existing filtering context, but move to button-based selection UI.

title: Add star rating component
description: Create 5-star rating component with icon buttons and add to currently playing UI.

title: Style scrollbars and Tailwind formatting rules
description: Apply overflow handling and styled scrollbars that match the existing panel design using Tailwind where possible (CSS ok for global scrollbar theme). Add lint/Prettier Tailwind rules so class order is enforced.
notes: Implemented global scrollbar styling aligned with the panel palette (thin track, cyan-to-pink thumb, hover brighten) and kept panel content overflow scrolling. Prettier now loads prettier-plugin-tailwindcss to enforce class ordering; eslint-plugin-tailwindcss is incompatible with Tailwind v4 so left out. Ready for review.

title: Add seek position tracking to player service
description: Expose current playback position, add seek support, and wire currently playing slider to service.

title: Update tasks API endpoints
description: Wire new tasks endpoints in API layer to match updated DTOs.

title: Add playlist detail panel action buttons
description: Add play/delete icon buttons to playlist detail panel; delete disabled for playlist id 1; disabled style muted without glow.

title: Add equalizer visualization to player
description: Add a 10-band LCD-style equalizer display to the currently playing panel driven by a new equalizer service tied to player state.

title: Adjust album letter filter interactions
description: Change Albums behavior so data reloads only when letter1 changes; letter2 changes filter locally. Tune debounce per letter input if needed. Make letter list keyboard navigation loop (wildcard cycles z <-> *). Filter letter2 options based on current letter1. Remove wildcard from first column.

title: Add VT323 display font
description: Add Google VT323 in Tailwind-friendly way and apply to nav title only.
notes: Imported Google VT323 font in styles via Tailwind base layer and applied to navbar title; documented Tailwind token usage in README.

title: Wire letter filters with shared component
description: Use the letter selector component for both album filter panels (letter1, letter2). Component accepts field param, prev/next callbacks, debounces selection, and updates query params without history changes. Implement focus handoff: filter1 next focuses filter2; filter2 previous focuses filter1.
notes: Updated letter selector to accept field id, prev/next callbacks, and debounce query param updates (replaceUrl). ArrowUp/Down navigate letters; ArrowLeft/Right trigger prev/next focus. Integrated two instances (letter1, letter2) on albums page with focus handoff between filters.

title: Update track duration display and add playback slider
description: Format track duration to mm:ss and add current time/duration with draggable slider in currently playing UI.

title: Add pre-commit hook for prettier and eslint
description: Ensure lint and formatting run on commit.
notes: Added npm format:check and lint steps to pre-commit hook (SKIP_PRECOMMIT_LINT to bypass) and documented in README.

title: Add scan action per folder
description: After folders table exists, add a scan button per folder row that calls POST /folders/{id}/scan to trigger a folder scan.

title: Add formatting/linting defaults (Prettier + ESLint)
description: Goal: establish repo-wide Prettier/ESLint setup aligned with Angular v21. Plan: 1) Inspect current toolchain and configs. 2) Add ESLint + Prettier config (deps, lint target, scripts) consistent with repo conventions. 3) Document how to run lint/format and ensure config enforces key Angular/TypeScript guidance.

title: Letter selector UX tweaks
description: Ensure letter selector scrolls selected option into view, wraps from Z back to wildcard on navigation, and on back arrow sets selection to wildcard before invoking previous callback.
notes: Letter selector now scrolls the active option into view on any change, wraps navigation, and pressing ArrowLeft/back sets selection to wildcard, updates the query param (debounced), and invokes the previous callback.

title: Add shuffle play mode control
description: Add shuffle play mode UI and state, including shuffle icon button in controls and active styling.

title: Refactor albums list into component
description: Extract the albums list panel and data loading/filtering into a dedicated component that accepts selected letters and an album-selected callback, keeping AlbumsPage focused on letter selection.

title: Refactor navbar into UI components
description: Restore Albums link and extract header/nav and nav links into reusable UI components.
notes: Restored Albums nav item and extracted navbar/nav-link UI components with Tailwind utility styling.

title: Build calendar page UI
description: Implement a calendar page at /calendar/:year/:month with prev/next navigation, day headers, and a responsive grid that adapts to month length.

title: Albums filter query-driven reload
description: Make Albums page reload data when letter1/letter2 query params change. Combine non-wildcard letters into startswith query param (e.g., ba). Omit startswith when both wildcards. Letter selector should stay in sync with query params.
notes: Letter selector now tracks live query params via signal and debounced updates. Albums page watches letter1/letter2 query params, combines non-wildcard letters into a startswith value, and re-fetches albums with the new backend startswith query (omit when both are wildcard or missing).

title: Refactor add folder form into component
description: Refactor the add folder UI on the Settings page into a dedicated component that owns its own form and creation logic.

title: List folders on Settings page
description: Fetch and display folders on the Settings page using GET /api/folders (accept: application/json). Render a table or simple rows showing each folder DTO with a final column reserved for actions/buttons. Do not implement yet; track as follow-up.
notes: Implemented Settings page folders table populated from GET /api/folders; actions column reserved for follow-on tasks.

title: Add delete action per folder row
description: Follow-on to folder listing: add a delete button per folder row calling DELETE /folders/{id} (soft-delete folder root). Wire to the Settings folders table once implemented.

title: Handle missing album covers gracefully
description: Track known-missing cover albumIds in memory to avoid repeated failed fetches when navigating.

title: Relax component naming lint and rename App root
description: Allow non-Component suffix/file names; update routes and root component naming.
notes: Introduced reusable Panel UI component wrapping neon glass styles and moved shell to use it.

title: Show tracks for selected album on Albums page
description: Use selected album (from album filter UI) to populate the Tracks panel on Albums page. Fetch via existing GET /albums/:id/tracks endpoint in core and render accessible track list in the right panel.

title: Remove album detail page
description: Delete or deprecate the album detail page and its routes/components once album selection is handled inline on the albums page.

title: Update track image API endpoint
description: Adjust track image API helper to use new POST endpoint.

title: Add letter filter UI component
description: Create a reusable letter selector UI (A-Z plus * wildcard) with keyboard navigation while focused. It should manage its own selected state and expose accessible semantics; integrate into albums filters panel layout per prototype.
notes: Added letter selector UI component (Aâ€“Z plus * wildcard) with internal selection state, arrow/home/end key navigation, and accessible listbox semantics. Integrated it into the first filter panel on Albums page, with a placeholder second filter panel and updated three-panel layout.

title: Externalize navbar/panel templates
description: Move inline templates for Navbar/NavLink/Panel into HTML files as per guideline.
notes: Moved Navbar, NavLink, and Panel inline templates into external HTML files while preserving Tailwind styling.

title: Pre-commit: use prettier write
description: Switch pre-commit hook to run prettier write instead of check.
notes: Pre-commit now runs npm run format (write) instead of format:check; README updated accordingly.

title: Add inline folder create form
description: Add inline form on Settings folders view to create a folder via POST /folders with body { path: string }. Use single textbox/folder selector and submit button.

title: Clean up navbar components and active state
description: Rename ui component selectors to drop app- prefix, fix nav active styling, add separators between nav links, and ensure albums route exists.
notes: Removed nav separators and backgrounds; active nav uses only text with cyan glow. Panel now min-height ~viewport and body scrolls when overflowing.
